14132.「あー！ あいつですー！\n あいつが 手強い旅芸人ですよー！:
Ahh! It's them! That's the strong-looking
minstrel!

14133.「フォッフォッフォ 感じます……。\n 私の弟弟子ポルファンと 同じオーラを。:
Ho ho ho, I can feel it... the same kind of
aura as my kindred spirit, Polfan.

14134.「あなたは ポルファンの弟子ですね。\n 役立たずのゲイザーより お強いようで。:
You are Polfan's student. You are stronger
than that useless Gazer. I like strong
people...

14135.「でもね 残念です。私 嫌いなんですよ。\n くだらん芸をする 旅芸人っていうの:
But it's a shame. I hate them. Minstrels who
can only do silly tricks... how can I put it?
I simply can't accept them.

14136.「もうね 好き嫌いの問題ではないです……。\n 生理的にダメ。つまらん芸とか ナ:
It's not a matter of liking or hating... it is physiological. Boring tricks and nonsense. I cannot comprehend the minds of people who can
laugh at those things...

14137.「もうね ホント世の中どうかしてますよ。\n どいつもこいつも つまらん芸で笑っ:
It's truly a mad world, isn't it? It's madness
that everyone laughs at such boring tricks,
yet my own comedy goes unappreciated.

14138.「で 結論。なにが言いたいのかというとですね。\n 旅芸人は この世から消えてく:
So here is my solution. I want all minstrels
to disappear from this world. If they won't
disappear, then I will kill them myself.

14139.「キャッ キャッ♪\n ボクたちも 殺したいですー♪: Kya, kya ♪ We want to kill you, too ♪♪

14140.「ボクたち ルルルリーチ様の特訓で\n ちょー 強くなったぜー♪:
We've become a lot stronger thanks to Master
Relulu's training ♪

14142.「私 好きなんですよ。命をかけた戦いが。\n 芸も 似たようなものですよね？\n:
I like it. A struggle for life. It's a lot
like performing, is it not? Ho ho ho. Let's
have some fun.

14143.「あなた また来たんですか？\n あれだけ 痛めつけてさしあげたのに\n まだ:
You came again? After all the pain I inflicted
on you, you still desire more lashings of
love?

14144.「フォッフォッフォ うれしいです。\n 私 好きなんですよ。弱い者をいたぶるのが:
Ho ho ho, I'm so happy. I like it. I like
beating up the weak. You are a nice person to
help me indulge in my hobby.

14145.「フォッフォッフォ。さあ 楽しませてください。\n 私は まだまだ 満足していま:
Ho ho ho. Let's have some more fun. I'm not
satisfied yet.

14146.「……フォッフォッフォ。お強いですね。\n しかし 悲しいことですが 才能ある者:
...Ho ho ho. You are very strong. But alas,
those with talent are discriminated against in
this world.

14147.「私は ポルファンより 才能がありましたが\n 魔物の芸など ウケるわけなく ど:
I had more talent than Polfan, but no matter
where I performed my monster tricks, no one
would acknowledge them...

14148.「しかし 自分より才能のない多くの旅芸人が\n 成功している……。私は絶望しまし:
But so many other minstrels with less talent
were succeeding... I despaired. The next thing
I knew, I began to resent their tricks...

14149.「フォッフォッフォ。才能が あったところで\n 世の中は それを正しくは評価しま:
Ho ho ho. Even if you have talent, the world
will never truly understand it, will it?

14150.「あなたは 自分の才能が認められなくても\n くさらずに 笑いの道を極められます:
Can you master the art of laughter, even if
your talent is never recognized?<yesno><close>

14151.「フォッフォッフォ。そうでしょうね……。\n そのように 強い心を持った旅芸人な:
Ho ho ho. Of course... there is no such thing
in this world as a minstrel with such a strong
heart...

14152.「フォッフォッフォ。ムリですよ……。\n そのように 強い心を持った旅芸人など\:
Ho ho ho. It's impossible... there is no
minstrel in this world that possesses such a
strong heart...
